name: 3dSynthesize
author: AFNI Developers
description: Reads a '-cbucket' dataset and a '.xmat.1D' matrix from 3dDeconvolve, and synthesizes a fit dataset using selected sub-bricks and matrix columns.

inputs.description: Input dataset from 3dDeconvolve via the '-cbucket' option.
inputs.name: Cbucket dataset

inputs.description: Matrix file from 3dDeconvolve via the '-x1D' option.
inputs.name: Matrix file

inputs.description: Output result into dataset with the specified name.
inputs.name: Output prefix

inputs.description: Select columns from the matrix and corresponding sub-bricks from the cbucket. Can use forms like 'baseline', 'polort', 'allfunc', 'allstim', 'all', 'something', or numbers/ranges.
inputs.name: Select columns

inputs.description: Don't compute the output, just check the inputs.
inputs.name: Dry run

inputs.description: Set TR in the output to the specified value.
inputs.name: Repetition Time (TR)

inputs.description: How censored time points from 3dDeconvolve will be filled (options: 'zero', 'nbhr', 'none').
inputs.name: Censor fill option
